good game, it's older than me
Yeah it's a nice game. Driving is fun, shooting is fun, usong the gravity gun is fun and advancing through the story is fun. Give it a try if you haven't played it yet.

One of the best games i have ever played. I encourage everybody that sees this to play this. Because the story is amazing, this is a must play for everyone on steam.
Good Game, But there is a bug inside a game with water reflections over all i like the game! you need to try your self :)
Надеюсь я доживу до выхода Half-Life 3

I really like Super Mario 64. The switch to 3D was done masterfully, with an almost perfect movement system with just the right amount of delay between each direction turned or jump made. The difficulty is also a very major plus, it doesn't hold your hand through the levels and gives you a challenge worth your time, when you die in the game it's almost never the game's fault.

Those are a few reasons why I like Super Mario 64, a masterpiece of gaming.

One of the best PC games ever made

It's overrated, a rather mediocre shooter compared to the first game which is a classic. I highly recommend Half Life 1 but this game is just a big disappointment in comparison. Completely different design philosophy. Not bad but just not good either.
Probably the best game ever made

One of the best Games ever

This game is amazing! I finished it 3 or 4 times and got all achievements.

 It's got some interesting weapons and nice shooting system. Graphics are nice. And the story...
Story is breath-taking and interesting.

 I highly recommend this game. You won't regret this purchase.
Famoso jogo classico, muito bom. Só compra :')
Нестареющая классика на века, перепроходить интересно как в первый раз! Рекомендовано всем без исключения как пример идеально выверенного гейм- и лвлдизайна! 10 из 3!
Very fun and interesting story. Do recommend.
